Willkommen auf der Website von Berthas Echo

Die neue Website - Wir sind "Back in Time"

Berthas Echo - Oktober 26, 1985

“Back In Time” (from “Back To The Future” soundtrack) Tell me, doctor Where are we going this time? Is this the fifties? Or nineteen ninety-nine? All I wanted to do Was play my guitar and sing So take me away I don’t mind You better promise ...
